item.title: Java Tutorial Day 01 - Hello World!
item.description: Goals Install multiple version java in your local Introduction of Java IDE Run Hello World Example Install multiple version java in your local To manage multiple Java versions on macOS, you can use a version manager like jEnv or SDKMAN!. Here’s how to set up each: SDKMAN curl -s "https://get.sdkman.io" | bash sdk list java sdk install java 11.0.2-open sdk install java 17.0.2-open https://sdkman.io/jdks sdk list java | grep oracle sdk install java 22-oracle sdk use java 22-oracle sdk default java 22-oracle Reference jEnv sdkman

item.title: Java for Beginner
item.description: Materials Java Beginner Learning Path Java Developer Center Overview Architecture Java Platform What can Java do? Development Tools Netbeans IntelliJ IDEA Setup Development Environment Install Java Install JDK & JRE What does Java 8 Packages include ? Getting Start Object Oriented Concept Object Class Instance Inheritance Language Basic Variables Data types Operators Control flow Array Annotation Interface and inheritance Numbers & Strings Generic Lambda Expressions Pattern matching Exceptions Packages Debug & Test
